interactivity.requirements: 15 Molly Affection You must have seen or permanently missed the following Events: Seen Main Events up to " Fireworks etc... "
interactivity.to_get_this_event: Visit the Koi Cafe at night

progression.synopsis: Sensei finds Molly sitting outside the cafe. She talks about the difficulties of being transplanted from one culture to another. Sensei says that although she's very different from him, he's still happy that she's here, and that he's impressed at how well she's doing. Molly wonders if she's on his love route, but he says not. She points out that there is a way in which they aren't so different â€” their "unearthly desire to be lazy" at their respective jobs (which is why she's sitting outside rather than working).

changelog: This Event was added in Update 0.13p2.
